thread.title: Cheryl (aka, Liam Payne’s GF) debuted her baby bump in the most low-key photo shoot ever
thread.title_full: Cheryl (aka, Liam Payne’s GF) debuted her baby bump in the most low-key photo shoot ever

author: Trilby Beresford
title: Cheryl (aka, Liam Payne’s GF) debuted her baby bump in the most low-key photo shoot ever
text:
Cheryl (aka, Liam Payne’s GF) debuted her baby bump in the most low-key photo shoot ever We’ve known about this for a while and have been obviously DYING for deets, and now, finally , notoriously private Cheryl Cole has officially announced her pregnancy with a gorgeous low-key photoshoot for L’Oreal and The Prince’s Trust.
Dressed in all-black, she glowed with happy anticipation while cradling her baby bump. Not to sound TOO gushy, but the love between Cheryl and One Direction’s Liam Payne continues to make us melt; remember how they met when Liam was auditioning as a solo artist on The X Factor ? Then he went and got all famous and everything, and now they’re just the sweetest couple who send impossibly cute joint Christmas cards . But back to the photo shoot.
I am proud to announce that I am one of fifteen ambassadors working with @PrincesTrust & LOreal Paris UK to help thousands of young people turn self-doubt into self-worth. The "All Worth It" Confidence training program starts now! Link in my bio #ALLWORTHIT #PRINCESTRUSTLOREAL 
A post shared by Cheryl (@cherylofficial) on Feb 23, 2017 at 12:03am PST 
Look closely. There she is fourth from the right. We LOVE how Cheryl chose this platform for a maternity photo shoot, because it promotes the “All Worth It” confidence training program which is designed to empower young people . She’s about to become a mom for the first time, but her agenda is still about how best to inspire others.
https://t.co/CQbzcONrDr #allworthit pic.twitter.com/Tc3JsvA41X 
— Cheryl (@CherylOfficial) February 23, 2017 And this goes without saying, but we are ridiculously excited for Cheryl and Liam’s baby to be born! We know Liam is going to be a great dad…because he’s Liam!
Morning jog 
A post shared by Liam Payne (@liampayne) on Dec 20, 2016 at 12:44am PST 
Wishing the happy couple all the best as they continue to prepare for parenthood, and um, feel free to do more photo shoots!
